## 0.14 Crawl Tournament

### TEAM ROSTER

Remember to put `# TEAMCAPTAIN MoogleDan` in your 0.14 .rc file. You can check to see if it is correctly placed by clicking on your .rc file link below. Once correctly inserted, your name will show up on the [team profile](http://dobrazupa.org/tournament/0.14/clans/moogledan.html) after a few minutes.

|                                                                                              |                                                                                             |                                              |                                                                         |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **Player**                                                                                   | **Profile**                                                                                 | **Preferred Server(s)**                      | **0.14 .rc file**                                                       |
| [MoogleDan](/User:MoogleDan "User:MoogleDan")                                                | [MoogleDan](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/scoring/players/moogledan.html)                       | [CSZO Webtiles](http://crawl.s-z.org/#lobby) | [CSZO](http://dobrazupa.org/rcfiles/crawl-0.14/MoogleDan.rc)            |
| [Flun](/index.php?title=User:Flun\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "User:Flun (page does not exist)") | [Flun](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/scoring/players/flun.html)                                 | CSZO Console                                 | [CSZO](http://dobrazupa.org/rcfiles/crawl-0.14/Flun.rc)                 |
| [HilariousDeathArtist](http://imgur.com/WlKjxYB)                                             | [HilariousDeathArtist](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/scoring/players/hilariousdeathartist.html) | [CSZO Webtiles](http://crawl.s-z.org/#lobby) | [CSZO](http://dobrazupa.org/rcfiles/crawl-0.14/HilariousDeathArtist.rc) |
| [CommanderC](/User:CommanderC "User:CommanderC")                                             | [CommanderC](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/scoring/players/commanderc.html)                     | CDO/CLAN Console                             | [CLAN](http://crawl.lantea.net/crawl/rcfiles/crawl-0.14/commanderc.rc)  |
| [Trystero](/User:Trystero "User:Trystero")                                                   | [Trystero](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/scoring/players/trystero.html)                         | CAO Console                                  | [CAO](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/rcfiles/crawl-0.14/trystero.rc)         |
| [Sildraith](/User:Sildraith "User:Sildraith")                                                | [Sildraith](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/scoring/players/sildraith.html)                       | CAO Console                                  | [CAO](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/rcfiles/crawl-0.14/Sildraith.rc)        |

### Useful Links

- [Tournament Overview](http://dobrazupa.org/tournament/0.14/)
- [Clan Leaderboard](http://dobrazupa.org/tournament/0.14/teams.html)
- [Ashenzari's Archivists Page](http://dobrazupa.org/tournament/0.14/clans/moogledan.html)
- [Current high value class/species](http://dobrazupa.org/tournament/0.14/species-backgrounds.html)
- [##crawlwiki IRC chat](http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=%23%23crawlwiki)

### Combos

**Races**: DD DE Fe Fo Gh Ko Mu Te VS | ~~Ce Dg Dr Ds Gr Ha HE HO Hu Mi Mf Na Og Op Sp Tr Vp~~

**Classes**: AE AK CK EE En He IE Tm VM Wr Wz | ~~AM Ar As Be Cj DK FE Fi Gl Hu Mo Ne Sk Su Wn~~

**Gods**: Ash Beogh Ely Fedhas Jiyva Lugonu Sif TSO Xom Yred Zin | ~~Chei Dith Kiku Makhleb Nemelex "No God" Oka Trog Veh Yred~~

### Brave Attempts or Glorious Splats

Only the wins are easy to find, so I looked up of the longer played characters who didn't find the orb.

|                                                                                              |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                |                                                                                                |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [MoogleDan](/User:MoogleDan "User:MoogleDan")                                                | [CeGl XL:18](http://crawl.berotato.org/crawl/morgue/MoogleDan/morgue-MoogleDan-20140412-042835.txt)            | [MiHe XL:27](http://crawl.berotato.org/crawl/morgue/MoogleDan/morgue-MoogleDan-20140416-212030.txt)            | [HuHe XL:20](http://crawl.berotato.org/crawl/morgue/MoogleDan/morgue-MoogleDan-20140417-212101.txt)            | [HuAK XL:18](http://crawl.berotato.org/crawl/morgue/MoogleDan/morgue-MoogleDan-20140418-175820.txt)            |                                                                                                |                                                                                                |

| [HilariousDeathArtist](http://imgur.com/WlKjxYB)                                             | [SpEn XL:21](http://dobrazupa.org/morgue/HilariousDeathArtist/morgue-HilariousDeathArtist-20140415-070401.txt) | [HuHe XL:21](http://dobrazupa.org/morgue/HilariousDeathArtist/morgue-HilariousDeathArtist-20140418-061118.txt) | [TeAE XL:25](http://dobrazupa.org/morgue/HilariousDeathArtist/morgue-HilariousDeathArtist-20140423-054417.txt) | [FoEE XL:20](http://dobrazupa.org/morgue/HilariousDeathArtist/morgue-HilariousDeathArtist-20140423-203032.txt) |                                                                                                |                                                                                                |
| [CommanderC](/User:CommanderC "User:CommanderC")                                             | [VSCK XL:20](http://crawl.develz.org/morgues/0.14/commanderc/morgue-commanderc-20140421-215721.txt)            | [MuIE XL:6](http://crawl.develz.org/morgues/0.14/commanderc/morgue-commanderc-20140420-133440.txt)             |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                |                                                                                                |
| [Trystero](/User:Trystero "User:Trystero")                                                   | [NaFE XL:20](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/rawdata/trystero/morgue-trystero-20140419-021648.txt)                   | [NaFE XL:16](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/rawdata/trystero/morgue-trystero-20140416-093407.txt)                   | [GrBe XL:14](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/rawdata/trystero/morgue-trystero-20140415-164115.txt)                   | [MiBe XL:12](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/rawdata/trystero/morgue-trystero-20140416-223542.txt)                   |                                                                                                |                                                                                                |
| [Sildraith](/User:Sildraith "User:Sildraith")                                                | [MiWr XL:27](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/rawdata/Sildraith/morgue-Sildraith-20140417-042222.txt)                 | [KoWn XL:22](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/rawdata/Sildraith/morgue-Sildraith-20140414-012802.txt)                 | [DDEE XL:18](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/rawdata/Sildraith/morgue-Sildraith-20140414-210845.txt)                 | [TrMo XL:16](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/rawdata/Sildraith/morgue-Sildraith-20140417-205337.txt)                 | [DEFE XL:27](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/rawdata/Sildraith/morgue-Sildraith-20140422-190037.txt) | [MiBe XL:22](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/rawdata/Sildraith/morgue-Sildraith-20140427-000802.txt) |

The new version of *Crawl* is nearly here, and with it comes another *Crawl* tournament (Oct 11-27).

### TEAM ROSTER

### Combos

Cross out when done

**Races**: Dg Dr Ds Fe Gr Ha HE Mu Na Og Op Te Vp | ~~Ce DD DE Gh HO Hu Ko Mi Mf Sp Tr~~

**Classes**: AE AM Ar As Cj DK Hu IE Mo Ne Sk Tm Wn Wr Wz | ~~AK Be CK EE En Fi Gl He FE Su VM~~

**Gods**: Chei Fedhas Jiyva "No God" Sif TSO Veh Zin | ~~Ash Beogh Ely Lugonu Makhleb Nemelex Oka Trog Kiku Xom Yred~~

## 0.12 Crawl Tournament

The new version of *Crawl* is nearly here, and with it comes another *Crawl* tournament (May 11-26). Anybody think they might be interested in signing up for the team? We got [4th place](http://seleniac.org/crawl/tourney/12b/teams.html) last year, and I'd love to reach the top 3 this time (unlikely though that may be).

Competing basically involves playing the latest version of the game online through any of the primary servers. The majority of the points a team earns are awarded for gathering runes, winning (preferably with combinations that haven't been won yet or multiple times in a row), and killing player ghosts, though you should see the [official rules](http://dobrazupa.org/tournament/0.12/) for the full scoring breakdown. The tournament lasts for just over two weeks, during which time you may attempt as many games as you like.

### [Current Team Roster](http://dobrazupa.org/tournament/0.12/clans/flun.html)

|                                                                                              |                                                                         |                         |                                                                 |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **Player**                                                                                   | **Profile**                                                             | **Preferred Server(s)** | **0.12 .rc file**                                               |
| [MoogleDan](/User:MoogleDan "User:MoogleDan")                                                | [MoogleDan](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/scoring/players/moogledan.html)   | CSZO Webtiles           | [CSZO](http://dobrazupa.org/rcfiles/crawl-0.12/MoogleDan.rc)    |
| [Flun](/index.php?title=User:Flun\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "User:Flun (page does not exist)") | [Flun](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/scoring/players/flun.html)             | CSZO Console            | [CSZO](http://dobrazupa.org/rcfiles/crawl-0.12/Flun.rc)         |
| [CommanderC](/User:CommanderC "User:CommanderC")                                             | [CommanderC](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/scoring/players/commanderc.html) | CDO Console             | [CDO](http://crawl.develz.org/configs/0.12/commanderc.rc)       |
| [spudwalt](/User:Spudwalt "User:Spudwalt")                                                   | [spudwalt](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/scoring/players/spudwalt.html)     | CAO Webtiles            | [CAO](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/rcfiles/crawl-0.12/spudwalt.rc) |
| [Lokkij](/User:Lokkij "User:Lokkij")                                                         | [Lokkij](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/scoring/players/lokkij.html)         | CDO Console (for now)   | [CDO](http://crawl.develz.org/configs/0.12/Lokkij.rc)           |
| [Bwijn](/User:Bwijn "User:Bwijn")                                                            | [Bwijn](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/scoring/players/bwijn.html)           | CAO Webtiles            | [CAO](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/rcfiles/crawl-0.12/Bwijn.rc)    |

### Proposed Team Names

With a pretty insurmountable lead, I think it's safe to say that we're going in as **Ashenzari's Archivists**.

### Combos

Cross out when done

**Races**: ~~Ce~~ ~~DD~~ DE ~~Dg~~ Dr ~~Ds~~ ~~Fe~~ Gh ~~Ha~~ HE ~~HO~~ Hu Ko Mf Mi Mu ~~Na~~ Og Op SE Sp Te Tr Vp

**Classes**: AE ~~AK~~ AM Ar As Be Cj CK ~~DK~~ EE En ~~FE~~ ~~Fi~~ ~~Gl~~ He ~~Hu~~ IE Mo Ne ~~Pr~~ Sk St Su Tm VM Wn Wr ~~Wz~~

**Gods**: Ash ~~Beogh~~ Chei Ely Fedhas Jiyva Kiku ~~Lugonu~~ ~~Makhleb~~ Nemelex ~~No God~~ ~~Oka~~ Sif Trog TSO ~~Veh~~ Xom ~~Yred~~ Zin

**Ongoing games**: \[none] (Flun), DDWz (commanderc), Too Many Deaths, I'm Out >\_< (MoogleDan), My last character also died YASD, so I'm out too (Lokkij), *I'm out, too.* (spudwalt), KoSu (Bwijn)

**Suggested non-overlapping combos**: MiBe, MfSk, DE\[EE/IE], DDNe

[Current high value class/species](http://dobrazupa.org/tournament/0.12/species-classes.html)

## See Also

TEAM ROSTER

Remember to put # TEAMCAPTAIN MoogleDan in your 0.14 .rc file. You can check to see if it is correctly placed by clicking on your .rc file link below. Once correctly inserted, your name will show up on the team profile after a few minutes.

Brave Attempts or Glorious Splats

Only the wins are easy to find, so I looked up of the longer played characters who didn't find the orb.

0.12 Crawl Tournament

The new version of Crawl is nearly here, and with it comes another Crawl tournament (May 11-26). Anybody think they might be interested in signing up for the team? We got 4th place last year, and I'd love to reach the top 3 this time (unlikely though that may be).

Competing basically involves playing the latest version of the game online through any of the primary servers. The majority of the points a team earns are awarded for gathering runes, winning (preferably with combinations that haven't been won yet or multiple times in a row), and killing player ghosts, though you should see the official rules for the full scoring breakdown. The tournament lasts for just over two weeks, during which time you may attempt as many games as you like.

Current Team Roster

Flun Flun CSZO Console CSZO
CommanderC CommanderC CDO Console CDO

Lokkij Lokkij CDO Console (for now) CDO
Bwijn Bwijn CAO Webtiles CAO

Proposed Team Names

With a pretty insurmountable lead, I think it's safe to say that we're going in as Ashenzari's Archivists.

En Fi Gl He FE Su VM '''Gods''': Chei Fedhas Jiyva "No God" Sif TSO Veh Zin | Ash Beogh Ely Lugonu Makhleb Nemelex Oka Trog Kiku Xom Yred ==0.12 Crawl Tournament== The new version of ''Crawl'' is nearly here, and with it comes another ''Crawl'' tournament (May 11-26). Anybody think they might be interested in signing up for the team? We got [http://seleniac.org/crawl/tourney/12b/teams.html 4th place] last year, and I'd love to reach the top 3 this time (unlikely though that may be). Competing basically involves playing the latest version of the game online through any of the primary servers. The majority of the points a team earns are awarded for gathering runes, winning (preferably with combinations that haven't been won yet or multiple times in a row), and killing player ghosts, though you should see the [http://dobrazupa.org/tournament/0.12/ official rules] for the full scoring breakdown. The tournament lasts for just over two weeks, during which time you may attempt as many games as you like. ===[http://dobrazupa.org/tournament/0.12/clans/flun.html Current Team Roster]=== {| class="wikitable" border="1" |- |'''Player''' |'''Profile''' |'''Preferred Server(s)''' |'''0.12 .rc file''' |- |[[User:MoogleDan|MoogleDan]] |[http://crawl.akrasiac.org/scoring/players/moogledan.html MoogleDan] |CSZO Webtiles |[http://dobrazupa.org/rcfiles/crawl-0.12/MoogleDan.rc CSZO] |- |[[User:Flun|Flun]] |[http://crawl.akrasiac.org/scoring/players/flun.html Flun] |CSZO Console |[http://dobrazupa.org/rcfiles/crawl-0.12/Flun.rc CSZO] |- |[[User:CommanderC|CommanderC]] |[http://crawl.akrasiac.org/scoring/players/commanderc.html CommanderC] |CDO Console |[http://crawl.develz.org/configs/0.12/commanderc.rc CDO] |- |[[User:spudwalt|spudwalt]] |[http://crawl.akrasiac.org/scoring/players/spudwalt.html spudwalt] |CAO Webtiles |[http://crawl.akrasiac.org/rcfiles/crawl-0.12/spudwalt.rc CAO] |- |[[User:Lokkij|Lokkij]] |[http://crawl.akrasiac.org/scoring/players/lokkij.html Lokkij] |CDO Console (for now) |[http://crawl.develz.org/configs/0.12/Lokkij.rc CDO] |- |[[User:Bwijn|Bwijn]] |[http://crawl.akrasiac.org/scoring/players/bwijn.html Bwijn] |CAO Webtiles |[http://crawl.akrasiac.org/rcfiles/crawl-0.12/Bwijn.rc CAO] |} ===Proposed Team Names=== With a pretty insurmountable lead, I think it's safe to say that we're going in as '''Ashenzari's Archivists'''. === Combos === Cross out when done '''Races''': Ce DD DE Dg Dr Ds Fe Gh Ha HE HO Hu Ko Mf Mi Mu Na Og Op SE Sp Te Tr Vp '''Classes''': AE AK AM Ar As Be Cj CK DK EE En FE Fi Gl He Hu IE Mo Ne Pr Sk St Su Tm VM Wn Wr Wz '''Gods''': Ash Beogh Chei Ely Fedhas Jiyva Kiku Lugonu Makhleb Nemelex No God Oka Sif Trog TSO Veh Xom Yred Zin '''Ongoing games''': [none] (Flun), DDWz (commanderc), Too Many Deaths, I'm Out >_< (MoogleDan), My last character also died YASD, so I'm out too (Lokkij), ''I'm out, too.''
